Articles.Content:
can someone create/mod this? 

can you size it to fit on Mk-1-2 pod 

can you include Real chute compatibility. 

![Z48.jpg](http://www.nasaspaceflight.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/Z48.jpg)

-thx jwc 

thx

Fasa has that part you can found it here [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24867-0-90-FASA-Feb-20th-90-Release-v5-22?p=304563#post304563](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24867-0-90-FASA-Feb-20th-90-Release-v5-22?p=304563#post304563)
The docking ports in my SDHI Service Module System parts pack are designed for the Mk1-2 Pod, and they have RealChute parachutes built into them as well.
